title: Who owns the worlds most expensive house? - Quora

response.answer_text: I remember watching a Travel Channel documentary on Antilia in Mumbai, India. Link Here. Valued at over $2 Billion in 2014, it is 27 stories tall, 400,000 sq ft, 3 helipads, 168 CAR GARAGE!! It is deemed to be the world's second most valuable residential property, after British crown property Buckingham Palace, and the world's most valuable private residence. The link has all the details.
Mukesh Ambani, an Indian business tycoon 10 of the world's most expensive homes
